name: Treasure Out In Space
description:
Made for LDG Jam 2023! Theme was: TREASURE!!!!

-Collect treasure and protect your ship from rival cannonfire!

-Left Click to engage your Tractor Beam (for treasure)

-Right Click to reposition the Deflector Shield (for cannonballs)

-Don't worry about moving the ship, autopilot will get you to

the next station!

-Your "Hull Gauge" indicates how close your ship is to falling apart!

-Your "Fuel Gauge" indicates how close your ship is to getting stranded in the middle of nowhere!

-The "Destination Gauge" is a cute little indicator of how close you are to your destination!

-The "Hold Gauge" shows how much treasure is packed into your hold. You can hold as much as you want, if you go over your limit you'll burn twice as much fuel! (not good!) If you're low on fuel already, it's probably a good idea to decrease your F.A.R.T. rate (Fetching All Rare Treasure) A red light marked "OVERLOAD" will blink when it's too late for you to worry about that anymore.

-Each space station you visit has a shop where you can trick your ship out with sick new upgrades

-Don't forget to repair your hull and "Top 'Er Off" to make sure you can get to the next station

-Rumor has it some treasure chests will bite you a few times. It imagine it only hurts a little bit but it's probably kinda gross.
